function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sparse literature on Latin American urban green spaces","Impact":"Lack of knowledge may hinder effective management of public spaces during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Increase research and data collection on urban green spaces in Latin America","Technologies":"Data collection technology, research collaboration platforms","People":"Public health officials, urban planners, park managers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Diversity of governance arrangements for parks and green spaces","Impact":"Inconsistent management strategies for disease control and public health measures","Mitigation":"Standardize guidelines for park management and disease control","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, GIS mapping tools","People":"Park managers, public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Government agencies, urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Recruiting interviewees through personal networks and non-profit organizations","Impact":"Potential bias in the information collected, limited representation of perspectives","Mitigation":"Diversify recruitment sources, verify information with multiple sources","Technologies":"Survey and interview platforms, fact-checking databases","People":"Researchers, public officials, non-profit organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, non-profit oversight organizations"}]}
